contentrichtext.text: '''Köppen''' is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: * [[Bernd Köppen]] (born 1951), German pianist and composer * [[Edlef Köppen]] (1893–1939), German author and radio editor * [[Friedrich Köppen]] (1775–1858), German philosopher * [[Jan Köppen]] (born 1983), German television presenter and DJ * [[Jens Köppen]] (born 1966), German rower * [[Kerstin Köppen]] (born 1967), German rower * [[Wladimir Köppen]] (1846–1940), German geographer, meteorologist, climatologist and botanist ==See also== * [[Koeppen]] * [[Koppen]] {{surname|Köppen}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Koppen}} [[Category:German-language surnames]]
